django.contrib.admin.templatetags.base
======================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.admin.templatetags.base


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.admin.templatetags.base.InclusionAdminNode


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: InclusionAdminNode(parser, token, func, template_name, takes_context=True)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.template.library.InclusionNode`


   Template tag that allows its template to be overridden per model, per app,
   or globally.


   .. py:attribute:: template_name


   .. py:method:: render(context)

      Render the specified template and context. Cache the template object
      in render_context to avoid reparsing and loading when used in a for
      loop.
